info.title: Multi-Agent Research System
info.description: A multi-agent system for conducting comprehensive research

get.description: Health check endpoint

post.description:
Start a new research task

This endpoint initiates a research process that runs asynchronously.
Returns a research_id that can be used to check status and retrieve results.

schema.title: Response Start Research Research Start Post

get.description:
Get the status of a research task

Returns the current status and any available intermediate results

schema.title: Research Id
Response Get Research Status Research  Research Id  Status Get

get.description:
Get the final result of a completed research task

Returns the full research report with citations and sources

schema.title: Research Id

post.description:
Run a demo research task synchronously for testing

This endpoint is for demonstration purposes and runs a simplified research task

schema.title: Response Demo Research Research Demo Post

post.description:
Test the citation agent functionality

This endpoint demonstrates how the citation agent adds citations to a report

schema.title: Response Test Citations Research Test Citations Post

get.description: Get list of available tools for agents

schema.title: Response Get Available Tools Tools Available Get

get.description: Get information about available models from all providers and current configuration

schema.title: Response Get Model Info Models Info Get

get.description: Check Ollama status and available models

schema.title: Response Get Ollama Status Ollama Status Get

post.description:
Index a repository for code analysis

This endpoint analyzes a local directory or clones a Git repository
and extracts code elements, dependencies, and metadata.

schema.title: Response Index Repository Kenobi Repositories Index Post

get.description:
Get complete analysis of a repository

Returns detailed analysis including all code elements, dependencies,
and AI-generated insights.

schema.title: Repo Id

post.description:
Search for code elements across repositories

Performs intelligent search across indexed repositories using
natural language queries and filters.

get.description:
Get dependency graph for a repository

Returns the dependency relationships between code elements
in the repository.

schema.title: Repo Id
Response Get Dependency Graph Kenobi Repositories  Repo Id  Dependencies Get

post.description:
Analyze a single file

Analyzes a single code file and returns extracted elements,
dependencies, and AI-generated descriptions.

schema.title: Response Analyze Single File Kenobi Analyze File Post

get.description:
List all indexed repositories

Returns a list of all repositories that have been indexed
by the Kenobi agent.

schema.title: Response List Repositories Kenobi Repositories Get

get.description:
Get Kenobi agent status and configuration

Returns information about the Kenobi agent configuration,
supported languages, and current statistics.

schema.title: Response Get Kenobi Status Kenobi Status Get

post.description:
Advanced repository indexing with semantic search and dependency analysis

This endpoint performs comprehensive analysis including:
- Code element extraction and categorization
- Dependency graph building
- Semantic embedding generation
- Advanced indexing for search

schema.title: Response Index Repository Advanced Kenobi Repositories Index Advanced Post

post.description:
Semantic code search across indexed repositories

Performs intelligent search using natural language understanding
and semantic similarity matching.

schema.title: Response Search Code Semantic Kenobi Search Semantic Post

post.description:
Find code similar to a given example

Takes example code and finds similar patterns across indexed repositories.

schema.title: Request
Response Search Similar Code Kenobi Search Similar Post

post.description:
Find code that matches a described pattern

Uses natural language description to find matching code patterns.

schema.title: Request
Response Find Code Patterns Kenobi Search Patterns Post

get.description:
Categorize all code elements in a repository

Analyzes and categorizes code elements using AI-powered classification.

schema.title: Repo Id
Response Categorize Repository Elements Kenobi Repositories  Repo Id  Categorize Get

get.description:
Get comprehensive dependency analysis for a repository

Returns detailed dependency metrics, circular dependency detection,
and coupling analysis.

schema.title: Repo Id
Response Get Advanced Dependency Insights Kenobi Repositories  Repo Id  Dependencies Advanced Get

get.description:
Perform comprehensive architectural analysis of a repository

Combines dependency analysis, categorization, and pattern detection
to provide architectural insights and recommendations.

schema.title: Repo Id
Response Analyze Repository Architecture Kenobi Repositories  Repo Id  Architecture Get

get.description:
Discover relationships and dependencies for a code element

Finds dependencies, dependents, and similar elements for a given code element.

schema.title: Element Id
Response Analyze Element Relationships Kenobi Elements  Element Id  Relationships Get

get.description:
Suggest categories for a specific code element

Uses AI-powered analysis to suggest appropriate categories with confidence scores.

schema.title: Element Id
Response Suggest Element Categories Kenobi Elements  Element Id  Categories Suggest Get

post.description:
Search across multiple repositories

Performs semantic search across multiple indexed repositories with
results grouped by repository.

schema.title: Request
Response Cross Repository Search Kenobi Search Cross Repository Post

post.description:
AI-powered code analysis with specialized prompting

Performs advanced AI analysis including code explanation, improvement suggestions,
test generation, security analysis, and performance optimization.

schema.title: Request
Response Ai Analyze Code Kenobi Ai Analyze Code Post

post.description:
Generate AI explanation of code

Provides comprehensive natural language explanation of what the code does,
how it works, and its key components.

schema.title: Request
Response Ai Explain Code Kenobi Ai Explain Code Post

post.description:
Generate AI improvement suggestions

Analyzes code for potential improvements in performance, readability,
maintainability, security, and best practices.

schema.title: Request
Response Ai Suggest Improvements Kenobi Ai Suggest Improvements Post

post.description:
Generate AI test cases

Creates comprehensive unit tests including happy path, edge cases,
error conditions, and integration scenarios.

schema.title: Request
Response Ai Generate Tests Kenobi Ai Generate Tests Post

post.description:
Add repository to vector database

Embeds all code elements from a repository into the vector database
for advanced semantic search and clustering.

schema.title: Request
Response Vector Embed Repository Kenobi Vectors Embed Repository Post

post.description:
Perform vector similarity search

Uses neural embeddings to find semantically similar code elements
with advanced filtering and ranking.

schema.title: Request
Response Vector Similarity Search Kenobi Vectors Similarity Search Post

post.description:
Perform vector clustering analysis

Groups similar code elements into clusters for pattern discovery
and architectural analysis.

schema.title: Request
Response Vector Cluster Analysis Kenobi Vectors Cluster Analysis Post

post.description:
Perform comprehensive quality analysis

Analyzes code quality including complexity, maintainability, security,
performance, readability, and documentation coverage.

schema.title: Request
Response Quality Analyze Element Kenobi Quality Analyze Element Post

get.description:
Get quality summary for repository

Provides comprehensive quality metrics and trends for an entire repository
including overall scores, issue distribution, and quality grades.

schema.title: Repository Id
Response Quality Repository Summary Kenobi Quality Repository  Repository Id  Get

get.description:
Get quality trends for element

Analyzes quality trends over time including trend direction,
strength, and predictions for future quality scores.

schema.title: Element Id
Days
Response Quality Trends Analysis Kenobi Quality Trends  Element Id  Get

post.description:
Perform batch quality analysis

Analyzes quality for all elements in a repository and provides
comprehensive quality assessment and recommendations.

schema.title: Request
Response Batch Quality Analysis Kenobi Quality Batch Analyze Post

get.description:
Get AI engine usage statistics

Provides insights into AI analysis usage, model performance,
and analysis type distribution.

schema.title: Response Get Ai Statistics Kenobi Statistics Ai Get

get.description:
Get vector database statistics

Provides insights into vector database usage, embedding distribution,
and collection statistics.

schema.title: Response Get Vector Statistics Kenobi Statistics Vectors Get

get.description: Get comprehensive dashboard overview

schema.title: Response Get Dashboard Overview Kenobi Dashboard Overview Get

get.description: Get real-time dashboard data

schema.title: Response Get Real Time Dashboard Kenobi Dashboard Real Time Get

get.description: Get detailed dashboard for specific repository

schema.title: Repository Id
Response Get Repository Dashboard Kenobi Dashboard Repository  Repository Id  Get

get.description: Get quality-focused dashboard data

schema.title: Response Get Quality Dashboard Kenobi Dashboard Quality Get

get.description: Get dependency-focused dashboard data

schema.title: Response Get Dependency Dashboard Kenobi Dashboard Dependencies Get

get.description: Get search and discovery dashboard data

schema.title: Response Get Search Dashboard Kenobi Dashboard Search Get

post.description: Perform comprehensive repository analysis

schema.title: Request
Response Analyze Repository Comprehensive Kenobi Analysis Repository Comprehensive Post

post.description: Analyze impact of changes to a code element

schema.title: Request
Response Analyze Dependency Impact Kenobi Analysis Dependency Impact Post

post.description: Analyze dependencies across multiple repositories

schema.title: Request
Response Analyze Cross Repository Dependencies Kenobi Analysis Cross Repository Dependencies Post

get.description: Analyze overall dependency health of repository

schema.title: Repository Id
Response Analyze Dependency Health Kenobi Analysis Dependency Health  Repository Id  Get

get.description: Find dependency patterns in repository

schema.title: Repository Id
Response Find Dependency Patterns Kenobi Analysis Dependency Patterns  Repository Id  Get

get.description: Get cache performance statistics

schema.title: Response Get Cache Statistics Kenobi Cache Stats Get

post.description: Clear cache entries

schema.title: Request
Response Clear Cache Kenobi Cache Clear Post

get.description: Get comprehensive analytics metrics

schema.title: Hours
Response Get Analytics Metrics Kenobi Analytics Metrics Get

get.description: Get real-time analytics data

schema.title: Response Get Real Time Analytics Kenobi Analytics Real Time Get

post.description: Start real-time monitoring for repositories

schema.title: Request
Response Start Monitoring Kenobi Monitoring Start Post

post.description: Stop real-time monitoring

schema.title: Response Stop Monitoring Kenobi Monitoring Stop Post

post.description: Perform comprehensive repository analysis using Repository Analysis Agent

schema.title: Request
Response Comprehensive Repository Analysis Kenobi Repositories Comprehensive Analysis Post

get.description: Monitor repository health with real-time metrics

schema.title: Repository Id
Response Monitor Repository Health Kenobi Repositories  Repository Id  Health Get

post.description: Batch analysis of multiple repositories

schema.title: Request
Response Batch Analyze Repositories Kenobi Repositories Batch Analysis Post

post.description: Compare multiple repositories across various metrics

schema.title: Request
Response Compare Repositories Kenobi Repositories Compare Post

get.description: Generate comprehensive insights for a repository using all Phase 4 capabilities

schema.title: Repository Id
Response Generate Repository Insights Kenobi Repositories  Repository Id  Insights Get

content.title: Content
content.description: File content (if not reading from path)

FileAnalysisRequest.title: FileAnalysisRequest
FileAnalysisRequest.description: Request to analyze a single file

is_local.title: Is Local
is_local.description: Whether import is from local codebase

import_type.title: Import Type
import_type.description: Type of import (from, import, require, etc.)

url.title: Url
url.description: Repository URL if cloned from remote
